summary: THERE HAS BEEN A CRASH OF A TESLA MODEL X IN HONG KONG.    HTTPS://WWW.YOUTUBE.COM/WATCH?V=GKA0MWYSVHW    THE TESLA IS THE ONLY VEHICLE INVOLVED.
